name: fencingmaster
0:
”Alexa, open fencing master”
”Alexa, launch fencing master”
”Alexa, ask fencing master what's a blade”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fencing master
des: This Alexa skill's purpose is to bring a fencing 101 course to the hands of anyone who owns an Amazon Alexa. Some technique is explained together with defining the parts of the weapons, the rules and offensive/defensive strategies. Moving forward, Alexa's repertoire will continue to grow to have a broader knowledge of the sport.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
